meanings.definition: To make or produce goods in large quantities, especially in a factory setting.
meanings.sent1: The company manufactures cars in their factory every day.
meanings.sent2: The factory manufactures toys for children around the world.
meanings.sent3: The robot tried to manufacture a cake, but it ended up a mess.
meanings.sent4: Her smile manufactures happiness wherever she goes.
meanings.sent5: The sun manufactures light to brighten our days.

meanings.definition: The process of making goods or products by hand or machinery.
meanings.sent1: The manufactures of handmade pottery take great pride in their work.
meanings.sent2: The local shop sells the manufactures of local artisans.
meanings.sent3: The cat's attempt at manufactures with yarn turned into a tangled mess.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a busy manufactures of creative ideas.
meanings.sent5: The factory tour showcased the impressive manufactures of the workers.
